verses.name: Genesis 12:1
verses.text: Now the Lord had said unto Abram, Get thee out of thy country, and from thy kindred, and from thy father’s house, unto a land that I will shew thee:

verses.name: Genesis 12:2
verses.text: And I will make of thee a great nation, and I will bless thee, and make thy name great; and thou shalt be a blessing:

verses.name: Genesis 12:3
verses.text: And I will bless them that bless thee, and curse him that curseth thee: and in thee shall all families of the earth be blessed.
